title: Watch, FIH Hockey Men’s Junior World Cup: Uttam Singh scores the winner to send India to semi-finals
content: Hockey Men’s Junior World Cup, India vs Netherlands, as it happened: India through to semi-finals#JWCMalaysia2023 #HockeyThe goal that sent India to the semi-finals of the men’s junior hockey World Cup!Captain Uttam Singh applied the finishing touch to a brilliantly worked penalty corner routinepic.twitter.com/rrkIbUt9Vx— The Field (@thefield_in) December 13, 2023
